pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, April 28, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the welcoming ceremony for Prime Minister of Japan Shinzo Abe.

Mackenzie Tower
West Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

9:55 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Prime Minister of Japan Shinzo Abe. An expanded bilateral meeting will follow.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

11:40 a.m.  The Prime Minister will participate in a signing ceremony with Prime Minister of Japan Shinzo Abe. A joint media availability will follow.

Sir John A. Macdonald Building
144 Wellington Street

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will host an official luncheon for Prime Minister of Japan Shinzo Abe, and deliver remarks.

The Westin Ottawa
11 Colonel By Drive

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage for opening remarks
